data.title: Park & Ride and Bowl Shuttle
data.meta_description: Avoid the stress of LA traffic and stacked parking with a bus ride to the Bowl and back to one of many lots across LA. Find a Park & Ride or Bowl Shuttle near you!
data.text:
In advance online: $10 + $2.45 per ticket fee and $2.50 order fee round-trip

In advance online: $10 (where prepurchase is available) + $2.45 per ticket fee and $2.50 order fee per ticket fee round-trip

Advanced sales are available until 10am the day before the concert.

Passengers with pre-purchased Park & Ride tickets will be given boarding preference, provided they arrive no later than ten minutes prior to their ticketed departure time.

Tickets are not interchangeable between Park & Ride Lot locations or dates. Only tickets for the current year will be accepted at the Park & Ride lots.

Refer to your ticket for bus departure times from the lots. For concerts with pre-shows, Park & Ride departure times are based upon the start time of the pre-show, not the concert.

Buses will drop-off riders at the Bowl at the top of Lot B. Patrons requiring accessible cart service can pick up that service from this location.

Pick-up at the end of the concert is located at the transportation hub on Highland Avenue. Follow signs and staff directions.

Parking is free at Bowl Shuttle lots, except at Ovation Hollywood (formerly Hollywood & Highland) where parking has a $20 daily maximum.

Advanced sales are available until one hour before the concert.

Departures from lots begin 2 1/2 hours prior to concert. The last shuttle departs each lot at concert time.
